pages.text: Psychopyge is a genus of Devonian trilobites known from Morocco. It had a lance like nose protrusion which may have been used as a shovel or as a way to fight with other Psychopyge. It also had small spines that extended from each segment of the body, and the head.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
